website_summaries.verdict: An affordable bag that performs just as well as many of the more expensive options.
pros: If you're on a budget, this is an excellent case for any Xbox model
It fits the console, 2 controllers, cables, and Kinect
Dedicated sleeves for games so you can leave cases behind
Customers praise this bag for its durability and protection
cons: Some customers found the fit to be a bit snug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for the console plus literally all of my 2-player accessories.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the Xbox One perfectly, and I can get TONS of stuff in here. Don't listen to the reviewers saying you can't fit two controllers; check out my photos--I fit Xbox One, Kinect, earbuds, HDMI, power brick+cord, 2 games in cases (not shown), 2 controllers, AND their Nyko charging stand. This is everything I need! Slick product, 10/10 lol.
customer_reviews.author: Luke W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! This fits the xbox, it's cords, a headset, and three controllers perfectly. The bag is the perfect size to fit the xbox so its not moving around. I really like that the bottom has little grips. Depending on how you pack it it could definitely fit more than I put in mine. I know for a fact I could fit at least 3/4 games in their cases in this along with the other stuff. Definitely 5 stars. My only "complaint" is it kinda smells weird but other than that it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Mullinax

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned with some reviews stating that there was not enough room. I recently purchased this case and find that it has plenty of room on the inside of the case to carry all my items. I have an Xbox One Elite which fits snugly in the case. I can carry my elite controller with its own case, an extra controller, the brick power strip and all cables. There is still plenty of space in the inside for other items. The outside of the case has a large pocket that expands and a smaller zippered pocket. Very happy with case.
customer_reviews.author: gustavo Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself and my friend. Each of us have an Xbox One. The console itself fits nice and snug in the compartment. Then we put the power block and cord, and HDMI cord into the zip pouch. We both put our games in their box in the outside compartment that latches. I don't want ot take th chance of the dics slipping out of the pockets. I can fit my controller in one of the pockets but my friend suggests not to do that. I do however put my headphones in the case as well, as seem to fit nicely and not get squished. I recommend this item for anyone with an Xbox One console.
customer_reviews.author: K.Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Carrying Case
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to protect my Xbox One when I would drive it to my friend’s house, and this ended up being a great solution. I don’t use the Kinect, so I was able to fit four controllers and all the necessary cables (power, HDMI) into the case. The outer pocket can hold a handful of games in their boxes. Packing and unpacking of components is fairly quick, meaning that I can now bring my console with me and be up and running within minutes. This is definitely the item to own if you like carting your system around.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This case is pretty decent for the price. It's got an individual spot for everything you need, and then some. The design is well laid out, and efficient. I wouldn't put my disks in the disk sleeves.... So those are useless. BUT, the product is still great. The materials could be better, but that would raise the price point. If you need to transport your Xbox, this is the bag to get.
customer_reviews.author: ROb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I work away from home regularly and this has made taking my Xbox with me for down time ridiculously easy. Keeps the console secure and well-padded. Has pockets big enough for 2 controllers and has a zippered bag for the power brick and cables. I can also comfortably fit my padded headset. I have also successfully travelled by plane, with the TSA perfectly happy with me just opening the bag and laying it open for the X-ray. The straps and carry handles are both good size and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: This carrying case was exactly what I wanted. It comfortably holds my Xbox One, a controller, battery pack (I put this in the slot they was probably designated for the Kinect) and all the cables I need. This all fit very comfortably. I made it fit a little tight by bringing my external hard drive (and cables) and my Xbox Elite Controller in its own carrying case stuffed inside. This carrying case wasn't made for this but it was able to carry these things - even if it was a little tight. Again, this goes beyond what it's advertised for doing but it was still able to do it. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Fits xbox one perfectly and firmly.  Not as good as a Pelican, but alot less money.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this on a couple different occasions now and I'm very happy with it. I'd prefer a little more padding, but it does hold the xbox one tightly, and does have some padding. It has room for everything, including a controller, and a power supply. I don't carry the kinect, so haven't tried that, though it looks like you could carry either the kinect, or power supply, but maybe not both. Note that this is speculating though, I haven't tried it. I'm very happy with this, and it's much cheaper than a big enough Pelican case, which would be the ultimate solution.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H

customer_reviews.title: Great case for XBOX ONE
customer_reviews.text: The case is awesome. I bought for my XBOX ONE to carry to my brother in laws house (he's got an XBOX 360) told him I would show him the latest and greatest from Microsoft. I Can fit everything I need in this case. Console-2 controllers-Battery pack w/cord- game case- and External hard drive case. Yes it all fits nice and snuggly. I would recommend this case if you travel with your XBOX ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonion

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I need it to
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. The pockets on the inside are a little to small to hold a controller and external hard drive easily but I was able to get them to fit. The case works great for me, the only thing I wish is that there was a littl more padding around the outside and that it had a layer of padding that you could put on top of the xbox. Everything just lays on top of the xbox when it's close. If it just had a little padding divider, it would be 5 stars. But it gets the job done and it doesn't cost much.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Has kept my xbox safe
customer_reviews.text: This has just enough room for my original xbox one, power cable, external hard drive, 2 controllers, 2 headsets, and an HDMI cable. I move it pretty often and this made it really easy to pack and unpack.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Every gamer must own
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my fiance and I and we both use a lot when traveling. I also used it while moving which was super convenient. My fiance is a gamer so he usually takes it home when we go visit parents and he is thankful I got him this. He use to re box it up, which is time consuming and not as durable.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Will Get Your Xbone From A To B
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little bigger to bring power supply, kinnect, and controller. This was also a pain to work with in the hurried pace of TSA security lines. More pouches to hold stuff would be great - I had a controller falling out when trying to re-secure the xbone. It was a pain. IT is made of a sturdy material and it did get my xbox to Argentina and back to the States without an issue. I took it as carry on. Fit in the TSA measuring thingie just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cadence Jean Morton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I bought it for my husband who is traveling a lot. He bought a small screen and is able to play nicely. He even had his xbox one mailed back to me in just this case without a problem. It was getting annoying holding on to the case. Doesn't scratch and is very secure. enough storage for his controller not so much his games.
customer_reviews.author: JEN

customer_reviews.title: If you transport your Xbone frequently, this is case is a good investment.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned and used this item for several months, making at least 40-50 round trips with my Xbox One. The case is still holding up well and not showing any signs of wear or failure. The console fits perfectly, and the power brick fits in the compartment where the Kinect is pictured. One controller and several game discs can also fit inside the case, along with any cables. The outside pockets can carry an additional controller or two. I've had no problems with the shoulder strap failing or showing signs of failure, despite how frequently I move my Xbone from house to house.
customer_reviews.author: FriedKarma

customer_reviews.title: Been having to do a bit of traveling lately and ita been the most useful bag i have and packing everything is super easy
customer_reviews.text: So i only bought this as a last minute cause i wanted to take my xbox on a trip i went on. Got it in the mail very quickly and it worked to well that i use it wherever i wanna take my xbox. Been having to do a bit of traveling lately and ita been the most useful bag i have and packing everything is super easy. It takes like two or three minutes. No regrets and once this one starts to wear away (which hopefully wont be any time soon) ill definitely by another.
customer_reviews.author: Doralisa

customer_reviews.title: protective and sturdy (although soft) carrying case for the Xbox one
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful, protective and sturdy (although soft) carrying case for the Xbox one, including a padded holder for the Kinect and multiple slots for game discs. Also includes a carrying handle. My only wish would have been an instruction sheet for what components were intended to fit where, but I figured it out. Perfect for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Garber

customer_reviews.title: ... what I want-- I travel a fair bit and love keeping my XB1 with me
customer_reviews.text: Does EXACTLY what I want-- I travel a fair bit and love keeping my XB1 with me. I have made some janky things to carry it with in the past, but this was a purchase I am happy to have made. The console fits very snugly (a good thing) in one side, and the velcro straps effectively hold it down. The other side leaves plenty of room for my power brick, headphones, controller, some games (out of case, in the sleeve pockets), and then I keep my HDMI and ethernet cables in the front pocket. This is not a flashy case but I didn't want flashy. I wanted safe, functional, and well made. All are achieved!
customer_reviews.author: Eli K.

customer_reviews.title: Carries your Xbox One and everything else you need!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I can carry my Xbox One, power supply and cable, a few games, HMDI cable, controller, headset (the mono one included with the Xbox, larger ones would not fit), extra batteries, Ethernet cable and even a small keyboard (it does need to be a small one though). Build feels solid, handle and shoulder strap work great. This is a real life saver if you are moving around around with your Xbox, very much worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: B. Finch

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought it before our move to Hawaii, at first it looks like nothing will fit but everything that comes with the xbox fit plus more! Held great made it from Colorado to Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Best Xbox One Case
customer_reviews.text: You need to fit an Xbox One with all its wires, remotes, and accessories. Then honestly this is the best item you could have bought for travelling either locally, or to some country or state. It looks like a piece of luggage but a piece of luggage for your Xbox One. It double straps your Xbox so it does not fall out and the zipper is closed all around so it can not open accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Sbeih

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Fits all yhe extra cords that go with my 2013 xbox. Fits n controllerz and also my laptop. Games fit perfect in tge outside pouch. I am able to fit 6 games in it. Shoulder strap is a great touch as well. Love the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: This case is made just for the Xbox One! ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is made just for the Xbox One!! The cables and power supply fit in their own little zipper pouch. The xbox fits perfectly. There is room for the controller, the headphones, a bunch of games, and even a double pouch for a cellphone and tablet. I bought one for each of my kids to protect there xbox one when taking it to their mother's house or to friends. Well worth the money, and I'm ordering another one right now for my girlfriend's kids.
customer_reviews.author: tim sickles

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't quite what I needed, but I kept it ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't quite what I needed, but I kept it anyway for use with my son's Xbox. Mine has the HDD/USB extension on the side and hindered it to properly fit into the case. Other than that, it's a quality product
customer_reviews.author: Fletch

customer_reviews.title: The case is sturdy, the ability to strap the Xbox in is ...
customer_reviews.text: The case is sturdy, the ability to strap the Xbox in is great, but the storage space could be bigger/ better. I am barely able to get the Xbox, 2 controllers, their charger and the power adapter in the case. I have a separate CD case that I use for the games, as the game slots on this go too far down so you can't see which games are where, and they kind of get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Albert

customer_reviews.title: Holds Up Very Well
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my boyfriend who loves gaming. I bought it a few years back and it's still holding up perfectly. It has plenty of space and keeps his console safe. I would definitely recommend this to anyone in search of a bag for their console.
customer_reviews.author: Max Horcic

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, just not as sturdy as I was hoping. but definitely bettervthan a book bag. It has straps to hold stuff in.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Xbox kept safe and secure during flight
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to store our XBox while traveling. Everything fit inside nicely and securely. We packed this inside our roller carry-on bag along with some other items, and our Xbox was safe and secure. Seems to be excellent quality and the price was right. I recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten SH

customer_reviews.title: Very handy travel case for the XB1
customer_reviews.text: This case is well designed and provides good compartments for all the accessories. The straps hold the console in place snuggly. One downside I see is that if you have a Kinect, you will only be able to fit one controller into the travel case. Also, I am not convinced the thin cloth provides good padding for the console. I know it doesn't say it is a case for protecting the Xbox during travel, but I feel like that is something more could've been done on that part.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lam

customer_reviews.title: While It most likely won't protect the console from serious abuse it seems like it will definitely get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Compared to few alternative travel cases I'd definitely reccomend this one for someone looking for a cheaper option. While It most likely won't protect the console from serious abuse it seems like it will definitely get the job done. The fact that the kinect holder is removable is defintely a plus and while the disk holders seem slightly suspect in terms of disk protection its a minor drawback. Can hold two controllers without too much difficulty as well. Also it has a pocket on the from that seems like it would hold some headsets with some stuffing.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Eberly

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great case for the Xbox one. Kind of a snug fit but that's kind of the point I feel like. It is a very well made product and has a lot of space for controllers, microphones and other accessories. Highly recommend for any traveling gamer!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor O

customer_reviews.title: No place for power pack and cord
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case; however, it does not have a place to put the power pack and cord. I'm putting them in the Kinect spot, so it's working okay, but if you have kinect you won't have a place for the power pack and cord.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Ps4 Fits in Xbox One edition.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Xbox One version. I just want to state for anyone wondering MY PS4 DOES FIT IN THE XBOX ONE MODEL SECURELY! I have both systems and was hoping I would be able to interchange systems and am happy that I am able to do so with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Quality  Case for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This case works perfect for the Xbox one. It fits the console, cords, 2+ controllers, and a headset. It is a nice looking quality case. I was pleasantly surprised when it came.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K

customer_reviews.title: Really good case. Makes me feel safe that my xbox ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good case. Makes me feel safe that my xbox won't get broken as I move it from place to place. Room for the cables seems a bit tight but it works. Only thing that I don't care for are the disc pouches and that there's only room for one controller
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N.

customer_reviews.title: My only concern is it doesn't have much padding but it does a great job holding my Xbox One and accessories
customer_reviews.text: This case does exactly as it says. My only concern is it doesn't have much padding but it does a great job holding my Xbox One and accessories. For the price - definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. Love all of the pockets. It also comes with a little bit long bag, I believe for the kenect if you have it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing case!
customer_reviews.text: I had the original Xbox One console (the big hefty one) and it fit just right. Since I didn't have a kinect, I put the cords in the middle, rectangular pouch and the controller in the inside pocket. Even had enough stretch room left for the Xbox headphones in the front pocket. All in all, super easy to use, plenty of room, and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great case albeit slightly too big for Xbox One S
customer_reviews.text: Great case, but a little too big for Xbox One S. I used to carry my new Xbox One S to Europe (the One S has built-in multi voltage power supply). It's a little too big for the One S, but I used the extra space for my game disc case, the controller and another unrelated device.
customer_reviews.author: K L

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Fits the Xbox one perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Fits the Xbox one perfectly. Just don't think you're going to have much room for anything else. A hdmi cord, power brick and cord, controller and 1-2 games is about all you're going to get into this bag. Material is a little weak but all in all, it's a good way to get your Xbox one over to a Lan party, or traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Braxton Todd

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Must have if you travel with your Xbox! Great quality and offers extra pockets for cords, games, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Trio

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price. Could use more outer padding.
customer_reviews.text: It holds everything easy enough and the price is nice but it could use just a bit more padding on the outside and maybe reinforce the corners. If bag is somewhere it may get banged around then this isn't the case to get. But simple transport to a buddies house is just right.
customer_reviews.author: R. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice bag, but it is smaller than needed. Most of the system doesn't fit just right, the kinect cord is a pain to get into the little bag. There isn't much room for the adaptor either. Also the sleeves for the discs I wouldn't use; they don't look safe (but I knew that when I bought it.) However, it is a nice bag and once you figure out how to place everything in it, it works and feels great! I do recommend this bad becuase you can still fit everything in it just fine; you just have to be a little creative!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Quality! FITS EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: GREAT Quality! With this pack I can fit: - XBOX One Console - XBOX One Power Supply - XBOX One HDMI - (4) XBOX One Controllers - Nyko Modular Dual Battery Charger - Western Digital 2 TB External SSD - XBOX One Games .....securelywith room to spare! I highly suggest this product. For anyone considering a travel case for your XBOX One and its accessories
customer_reviews.author: Mr. McFly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great case for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for a friend and they said it was amazing for their Xbox One. So, I ordered one for myself too. It fits my Xbox One console and accessories pretty well. It could definitely use more padding around the outside of the bag to protect the unit as well as an extra pocket for a second controller. Besides that, it holds your games, power source and kinect so you can bring your XBO wherever you go!
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Xbox one great! I don't use it for carrying places though
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Xbox one great! I don't use it for carrying places though, i use it to store my Xbox when I'm not playing it. It seems like it's sturdy enough to handle regular carrying though.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: There are elastic bands on the sides which are great for controllers and earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for business so this was just what I needed to bring my XBOX One with me to hotels. Everything fits well and there are straps for the xbox unit as well as a zip up pouch for the power cables. There are elastic bands on the sides which are great for controllers and earbuds. THE ONLY PROBLEM I have with it is that there could be some more padding.
customer_reviews.author: Lou T

customer_reviews.title: great travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, holding up nicely. 12 yo son uses it frequently and we've had no issues. Fits his xbox one, games, power brick, hdmi cable, remote cable, spare batteries and a controller, but you have to be a tetris master.
customer_reviews.author: Zenzu25

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an extended work trip and it works well. I put my xbox, controllers, a tablet, a book, and a few other things in it and used it as my carry on. I put the cables and power supply in my checked bag and everything arrived safely. This will make this trip a little more tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great case for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Really great case for transporting Xbox One It is definitely protective enough to keep in a car while traveling. It fits my Kinect, two controllers, and the power adapter just fine. When I have the Kinect in the pouch, there is no "spot" for the power adapter but it fits in there just fine. I usually put a couple games in the outside pocket and that works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Xbox case.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly stores Xbox and accessories. Seems to be good quality. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Camden

customer_reviews.title: You will love this.
customer_reviews.text: As someone that likes to travel with my Xbox, this case was a must. It works perfectly and I can also fit my 13" macbook pro laptop and an iPad mini in there as well! I can't believe I used to carry around my xbox through the airport in its' original box haha. You will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Max Calcaterra

customer_reviews.title: Holds Up Well
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my teenage sons Xbox One system. He takes it along with him to friends houses or other relatives houses. He received it for Christmas and it has held up well. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Crisscat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for light travelers
customer_reviews.text: Really cool, for thirty bucks sturdy, nice rubber bottom thingies, compartments and sturdy room for all the stuff... wouldn’t recommend putting through an airport... but for regular travel absolutely😊
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for years. Carried my XBOX in and out of college dorms and houses. Never once broke or injured the console.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good, functional carrying case for Xbox 1
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good carrying case for my Xbox one console and peripherals. Carrying strap is a bit on the flimsy side and wouldn't want to use it to carry a long distance but works in a pinch. Could use a bit more storage space in it so you can carry your power brick and Kinnect camera gear at the same time. I find you can carry one of these items in the bag easily but there's not room for both. Could also use another pocket for an extra controller.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G. King

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Fit for XBox One S
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine case, but it's a terrible fit for the Xbox One S (2016), which is smaller than the XBox One. You can tighten the internal straps, but this will deform the case, and the console can still slip out. They shouldn't claim this will fit the One S - sure, you can put it inside the case, but that doesn't mean it's a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tamer Abdelgawad

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says...
customer_reviews.text: I like the case, albeit it is a little limited. For example, I can only pack one controller in it. However, it's really not that bad. It's pretty secure, lightly padded, and for the price, a good way to stay organized. I don't use it often, so I can't speak to it's durability for those that pack-and-go a lot. But for the light user, it's a pretty good item to have.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tabales

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, very compact, fits a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this, this week so this is just a current review, after a few months I'll post how's the build quality. First this bag is so compact and fits everything I need to hold. I have the first style Xbox one with the big power supply.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my son's XBox One as it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son's XBox One as it was advertised, but it's a bit tight with an extra controller and games. Ended up getting a padded/ soft-sided laptop bag.
customer_reviews.author: P. Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Decent case.... not the best but will do.
customer_reviews.text: This thing does what it is intended for however it is not the best case. I love my Xbox360 backpack case because it is built for it. This case feels flimsy and sometimes you wonder if it will fit the XBONE but it does. I defintely feel they could make it bigger and add more padding and extra pouches for things such as extra controllers.
customer_reviews.author: King Kaus

customer_reviews.title: ... but he raved about it - said it was perfect for whatever the needs are for carrying an XBox ...
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son but he raved about it - said it was perfect for whatever the needs are for carrying an XBox One around!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not padded or thick so I would not recommend for heavy duty travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my stepson who transports his Xbox One between houses on weekends. Has held up well with frequent use. Plenty of room for the system, cords, controllers and games. Not padded or thick so I would not recommend for heavy duty travel.
customer_reviews.author: JSay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have the original size Xbox One with a data bank and a fan attached to the top of it. I was able to fit all of that in including the power supply, HDMI, one controller, one usb and a game (with the case). I think if I would have had the game in a sleeve for the pocket rather than the case, I could have easily fit another controller in there. It's very convenient and perfect if you like taking your Xbox places.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Fits xbox one yeah!
customer_reviews.text: Love it fits all my Xbox one needs would've been better if it had enough room for two controllers with charger. All in all great buy.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this carrying bag. This is his second one since the dog decided to chew the zipper off the first one. He uses it frequently enough to say its well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Droneitup

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Overall extremely happy with case. Case is well built and can carry xbox one with ease. Well worth the price.If your looking for a great priced case this is it. Cons: none
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for when he goes to his mom's for the weekend. This is so much better than the duffle bag he was using to tote around his new Xbox One S. Plenty of pockets and nice sturdy adjustable strap. We used the kinect pouch to hold 2 controllers since the xbox one s doesn't come with a Kinect. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: TAS

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for travelling with an Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for travelling with an Xbox One. The case is designed so that everything fits easily and securely. I only gave it 4/5 stars because it is not as padded as I would have hoped. Definitely better than no case at all, but still be careful (as always) when handling your game system.
customer_reviews.author: Matt-G

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to be able to transport my Xbox One when I needed to take it with me on the go. It is perfect. Holds my Console, Controlers, Kinect, Charger Block and Wires. Worth the price and much better than sticking it in a box or just throwing it the back of your car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: The bag was a little tight fitting for my son to handle ity on his ownwhen trying to put everything inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin G

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for him
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend absolutely loves this carrying case for his x box one, great quality and lots of storage space for games and controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Kezia Cecelia Engrums

customer_reviews.title: He would recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son, he carries it with him all the time and he says it works well and keep his system safe. He would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: It comfortably fits everything and is super easy to carry around
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance and he loves it. We live a few hours apart so when he comes on the weekends he was usually packing his xbox one in the box it came in (we play xbox together). But this baby was a lifesaver. It comfortably fits everything and is super easy to carry around. Because he liked it so much, we bought one for our friend for a Christmas gift. Definitely recommend if you're consistently lugging around your xbox.
customer_reviews.author: Online Honesty

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy, fits everything nicely, my husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: kylie

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my son to take his XBox ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to take his XBox One back and forth to college and it works perfectly. It also appears to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: James Foxall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for transporting your xbox one
customer_reviews.text: I use this case to transport my xbox to and from college and it works great. I knocked off one star because there isn't much space for controllers and an external hard drive, but i did make it work without modification. It was just a somewhat of a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Great protection.
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Fits my sons xbox one, cords and controller perfectly. Well made and keeps everything save for when he brings it back and forth from my house to his dads house.
customer_reviews.author: CityWife

customer_reviews.title: ... my boys for the xbox ones & they are perfect & padded as needed
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 for my boys for the xbox ones & they are perfect & padded as needed. Great for traveling to grandma & grandpa house & when vacation traveling
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Case for Travel with XBox One and Kinect
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good case for the xbox one. We just returned from a trip to visit the grandparents and the boys wanted to bring their xbox. This case was sized perfectly and I was able to pack the console, the kinect, 4 controllers and all of the cables in the case. We then carried it onto the plane. This is a great case and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Derminator

customer_reviews.title: Great travel case!
customer_reviews.text: My Xbox One travels in this case all the time. Plenty of room for basic components. I don't take my Kinect unit when I travel but I think there would be room for it if I wanted to. Works really well for me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Xbox lovers need this!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a life saver. I hated putting my xbox and cords into the original box it came in when I traveled. This works so well and has a lot of room! Love the Kinect holder and disc slots.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Travel. Fits xbox, games, laptop and iPad. Easy to remove at the airport TSA and put back in after they harass you. Also fits as a stowaway item under the seat when flying.
customer_reviews.author: jpnas1o19

customer_reviews.title: Great case.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas. He was surprised and excited. He loves this case.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Good for short travels
customer_reviews.text: I recently traveled using this to carry my Xbox. You can fit a lot of stuff inside. But padding could be better. Do not check it in and take it as a carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Yoezus

customer_reviews.title: This is a good carrying case for the Xbox
customer_reviews.text: This is a good carrying case for the Xbox, and fits it very well. It is sturdy and made of good material that is not flimsy and will protect it.

customer_reviews.title: Makes things easier
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it fits all his stuff for his Xbox. Makes it easier to take back and forth also
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Makes it easy and protects it but I would still recommend being ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected and I've used it to travel through the airport several times now. Makes it easy and protects it but I would still recommend being careful with it. Haven't tried carrying it with a kinect in it but I think it would fit.
customer_reviews.author: D. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice carrying bag. Holds xbox one, power supply, controller and cables. I have been using it for nearly a year and it has held up great. It is fairly thin and the zipper is less than stout but it does the job and if you don't abuse it it will serve you well.
customer_reviews.author: KING

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my son so he could travel with his ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son so he could travel with his Xbox 1 for the summer, it has turned into his whenever we travel bag. It works well in protecting his game system and carrying some games with it. I am purchasing an additional one for his Xbox 360.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. No padding so be carful
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. No padding so be carful. It is very nice to transport from 1 house to the next. Have purchased 2. So far no issues. Have used 3 times traveling and taking to friends house. Everything has a place.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Decent carrying case. If you need space for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent carrying case. If you need space for a bunch of controllers and games too, think about getting a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Spitz

customer_reviews.title: PlayStation only fits PlayStation.
customer_reviews.text: I have both PS and Xbox bags and have bought more to store my ps2 and others. The xbox bag is still a little tight but will fit and won’t move a muscle, believe me. I had tried to fit the fat Xbox in the PS bag but only ended up sweating in the end. Great thick bags that keep your investment secure.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I spent a forever looking for something to carry my Xbox one when I travel and found this. It is perfect. Everything fits inside and I'm not worried about anything breaking. I would definitely recommend this to other people.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Mckey

customer_reviews.title: The way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how well this worked, all the pieces of the Xbox one fit perfectly. Grate for the family on vacation. Good padding. If you need a carrier for your Xbox one, this is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hanshaw

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough for an eleven year old to pack himself. The kids really like it
customer_reviews.author: Bill Tidswell

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Just what my son needed. Reasonable price and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Luvspel57

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Certainly does the trick! I travel a lot for work so now I can bring my xbox along with me!
customer_reviews.author: H&M ✔️

customer_reviews.title: Great case.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job of protecting my Xbox well and plenty of compartments to store things. Great case.
customer_reviews.author: Tammerz21

product_meta.title: CTA Digital Multi-Function Carrying Case for Xbox One XB1-MFC
product_meta.description: Style:Xbox OneComfortably carry your gaming system wherever you go with CTA Digital's Multi-Function Carrying Case for Xbox One. This case is specifically designed to store and carry the Xbox One, Kinect, games and accessories with the extra protection they need to stay secure during travel. Made with durable nylon fabric and protective foam padding, the carrying case is the perfect solution for any gamer on the go. Built-in straps are designed to hold the console so it won't move while carrying. The case includes storage for 5 games inside the convenient disc slots, as well as internal and external pockets for controllers, cables, and anything else you may need to go along with your gaming system. Inside the case, you'll also find a 48-inch adjustable shoulder strap, and a separate foam padded pouch for the Kinect, which can be securely attached inside the case. Features: * Compact design perfect for travel * Durable nylon fabric * 2 Built-in straps to secure the console * 2 External pockets for accessories * 2 Internal pockets for accessories * 1 Removable pouch designed for the Kinect * 5 Disc pockets Specifications: • Designed for Xbox One • Dimensions: 15 x 12.25 x 6.5 inches Package Includes: (1) Multi-Function Carrying Case (1) Removable pouch for Kinect (1) 48-Inch adjustable strap
feature_bullets: 2 Built-in straps to secure the console
5 Disc pockets, 2 external pockets and 2 internal pockets for accessories
1 Removable pouch designed for the Kinect

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars640 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
